objectives.name: Define and Align
objectives.description: To achieve a common understanding of our work norms and align manager behaviors to foster a workplace environment that drives productivity and high engagement necessary for long-term goal attainment.

objectives.name: Commit and Champion
objectives.description: To establish a collective commitment among managers to visibly model and actively champion the new work norms, creating a safe and supportive environment that encourages all team members to fully embody these behaviors in their daily work.

objectives.name: Own and Measure
objectives.description: To take ownership of the outcomes by committing to the successful adoption of the new norms and to monitor and measure the resulting positive changes in employee engagement, satisfaction, and observable behaviors over the next year.

norms.name: Mag-usap, Mag-angat, Makinig: Speak Up, Lift Up
norms.description: This is about fostering a safe environment for open communication, where team members can fearlessly express ideas and respectfully challenge the status quo to reach the best outcomes.

behaviors.name: Listen to Understand, Not Just to Reply
behaviors.description: Practice active listening to fully grasp others' perspectives.

behaviors.name: Promote Healthy Conflict
behaviors.description: Focus on the issue, not the person, to have productive disagreements.

behaviors.name: Respectful Feedback
behaviors.description: Focus on facts and data. Praise in public to celebrate success and provide private feedback for constructive criticism.

norms.name: The Entrepreneur's Edge: Own It, Win Big
norms.description: This is about acting like a business owner, embracing a mindset of courageous innovation, agility, and rapid scaling to achieve significant wins.

behaviors.name: Be a Business Guardian
behaviors.description: Make decisions with a deep commitment to the business's best interests, ensuring its long-term health and growth by being intentional and strategic in the use of resources like time, equipment, and manpower, maximizing their value as if they were your own.

behaviors.name: Innovate and Scale Courageously
behaviors.description: Proactively seek new ideas and better ways of working, embracing an agile approach to scale ideas and solutions quickly.

behaviors.name: Level Up Every Day
behaviors.description: Use every experience as a chance to learn from mistakes and drive continuous improvement, fueled by an entrepreneurial mindset.

detailed_norms.name: Plan It, Win It
detailed_norms.description: This norm emphasizes a proactive, goal-oriented approach to work, focusing on clear planning, execution, and success.

behaviors.name: Set and commit to goals and metrics
behaviors.description: Establish clear, measurable objectives for the team.

behaviors.name: Prioritize goals and create timelines
behaviors.description: Determine which goals are most important and create a schedule for achieving them.

behaviors.name: Clarify before action
behaviors.description: Ensure everyone understands the plan and their role before starting a task.

behaviors.name: Track progress regularly
behaviors.description: Monitor performance against goals to stay on course.

behaviors.name: Leverage data and insight
behaviors.description: Use information to inform decisions and anticipate needs.

detailed_norms.name: Speak Freely, Challenge Politely
detailed_norms.description: This norm is about fostering an environment of open communication and constructive feedback, where team members feel safe to share ideas and disagree respectfully.

behaviors.name: Active listening (listen to understand)
behaviors.description: Focus fully on what others are saying before responding.

behaviors.name: Promote healthy conflict, no artificial harmony
behaviors.description: Encourage honest, productive discussions and disagreements.

behaviors.name: Focus on the issue, not the person
behaviors.description: Keep discussions objective and avoid personal attacks.

behaviors.name: Everyone gets an uninterrupted turn to speak
behaviors.description: Ensure all voices are heard and no one is cut off.

behaviors.name: Praise in public, reprimand in private
behaviors.description: Acknowledge successes openly while handling corrective feedback discreetly.

systems: Facilitator Training (Managing Meetings and Handling Conflict)

detailed_norms.name: No One Left Behind
detailed_norms.description: This norm focuses on creating a supportive, collaborative culture where team members look out for one another and help each other succeed.

behaviors.name: Offer to help a colleague with their workload
behaviors.description: Provide assistance when a teammate is struggling.

behaviors.name: Include everyone in discussions
behaviors.description: Make sure all team members are part of important conversations and decisions.

behaviors.name: Collaborative problem-solving
behaviors.description: Work together to find solutions to challenges.

behaviors.name: Invite quieter individuals to share their thoughts
behaviors.description: Proactively seek input from those who are less likely to speak up.

behaviors.name: Share knowledge and resources
behaviors.description: Ensure that information and tools are accessible to everyone on the team.

detailed_norms.name: Finish Strong, Finish Right
detailed_norms.description: This norm highlights the importance of accountability and quality, ensuring that commitments are met with high standards.

behaviors.name: Set clear and agreed-upon SMART objectives
behaviors.description: Define specific, measurable, achievable, relevant, and time-bound goals.

behaviors.name: Holding each other accountable
behaviors.description: Take ownership of commitments and ensure policies are followed.

behaviors.name: Cross the finish line
behaviors.description: See tasks through to completion.

behaviors.name: Attention to details
behaviors.description: Ensure that work is meticulous and meets quality standards.

behaviors.name: Regularly update and analyze lead & lag measures
behaviors.description: Continuously monitor progress to ensure quality outputs are met.
